abstract:
It is our intention to introduce a partially ordered monad as a monad T = (T, η µ) in a given base category C provided with the following additional properties:
For every C-object X the object T(X) is a partially ordered C -object.
The clone-composition-function is isotone in both variables.
For every C-object X the component µX
of the multiplication µ has a left adjoint C-morphism.
meta: In book: Many Valued Topology and its Applications (pp.29-54)
